name: file-explorer-app
description: A modern file explorer web application with mixed runtime architecture

scripts.start: ./scripts/setup.sh && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d && echo 'App running at http://localhost:3000 (API: http://localhost:3001)'
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd apps/backend && npm run dev" "cd apps/frontend && npm run dev" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.build: cd apps/backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd apps/backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm run test
